column4: can someone help me troubleshoot an install problem please. first time installing linux.
i've asked my question. no one answers
i get a "no screens found" error when x whatever fails after choosing install
coz your question is like rocket science
hmm. private messages are blocked from unregistered users
my message is "failed to start the x server. then after, in details, says no devices detected. fatal server error. no screens found
i cant install edgy. message after choosing install is "failed to start the x server. then after, in details, says no devices detected. fatal server error. no screens found
i have no experience with linux
how do i get to my etc/x11/etc etc etc
this was supposed to be an easy, gui installer lol
how do i get to a command line from booting to the install CD. thats the only way i could browse files i guess
i'm using a pci express x300 video card. would i have better luck switching to onboard intel video?
should i try an older version of ubuntu
instead of 6.10 try the older one
does that CD have less "bugs:" maybe
i thought i had integrated video as an option, turns out i'm stuck with my x300
you do get a GUI when you install?  but not after?
